text:
Hi Keegan, Jason kinda answered this in a previous question above.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YGWHDKQ/p1579014541009700>

Tl;dr it takes a few weeks and can vary depending on the volume we are receiving and our staffing. The marketplace team is always working to find ways to speed up the process without sacrificing our commitment to quality. Over time I would expect it to get quicker and quicker. Thank you for your patience.
